RequirementText: 'The application shall be able to complete every user transaction within one fourth of a second of receiving the request over the network.'

'Changes to revenue and expense formulae must be applied to the RFS system every year prior to the budgeting process start. Revenue and expense formulae will be updated within one week of their receipt after which 2 weeks will be allotted to testing of the budget calculations to be conducted jointly by the project development team and PCG Finance.'
'The system shall display the local and exercise time in separate clocks'
'The website should cater to all tribes in Nigeria.'
The system shall be easy to use by callers and supervisors. Callers and supervisors must be able to accomplish any system task within 2 minutes.'
'The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.'
'The product shall be able to be installed in any operating environment within 2 days.'
'The adjuster shall request a recycled parts audit of the collision estimate.'
'The product will record meeting acknowledgements.'
'Only users with Update access must be able to initiate dispute requests.'
'The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.'
'The ratings shall include categories for attempted use of recycled parts and actual use of recycled parts'
'The system shall allow a user to define the time segments'
'The response time of general student management tasks shall take no longer than 5 seconds and the response time of schedule generation shall take no longer than 30 seconds.'
'The product shall interface with the Choice Parts System. This provides the feed of recycled parts data.'

'The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.'
'The estimator shall apply selected recycled parts to the collision estimate.'
'All authorized users once authenticated must be able to logon to the Disputes System'
'The WCS system shall be available at all times as long as IBM’s internal intranet W3 is accessible. The WCS system will be available 95% of the time IBM’s internal intranet W3 is available.'
'The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.'
'Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.'
'Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.'
'Staff members shall be able to complete a set of tasks in a timely manner.'
'System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the “My Account” section of the website.'
'The product shall allow a player to position ships horizontally on their grid.'
'A cohort shall be associated to one Program of Study offered by the department.'
'The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.'
'The system interface will use CCR nomenclature. The system must use the same nomenclature used in the existing WCS system and reports'
'The product shall operate with every platform.The product shall accommodate any new technology without any change in its architecture.'
'The Disputes System shall provide view access capability for authorized users of the application.'
'The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.'
'The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.'
'The product shall provide Asynchronous Messaging.The product shall provide asynchronous messaging to enable parallel processing and reduce the overhead in communications'
'The system shall have a professional appearance'
'Aside from server failure the software product shall achieve 99.99% up time.'
'The estimator shall search by zipcode with a radius of 30 miles if no parts are found for the preferred parts suppliers'

'The Disputes System must allow the user to create three unique types of ticket retrieval requests. The three types of ticket retrieval requests are (1) Request for original receipt (2) Request for a copy of the receipt or (3) Request for a portfolio. A portfolio consists of documentation that would provide proof of a purchase such as the documentation that is received from a car rental agency that is more than a sales receipt.'
'The WCS system shall have the ability to include data for regions outside the United States and be accessed by users outside of the United States if approved by CCR management.'
'If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.'
'Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order'
'The Disputes System must prevent external users from requesting original receipts. Requests for original receipts are restricted to internal users.'
'Each team owner will need to use a username and password in order to be authenticated to reach the team owner’s page'

'The RFS system should be available 24/7 especially during the budgeting period. The RFS system shall be available 90% of the time all year and 98% during the budgeting period. 2% of the time the system will become available within 1 hour of the time that the situation is reported.'
'The estimator shall not apply recycled parts to the collision estimate if no available parts are returned.'
'The system shall be capable of processing 100% of nursing students and their classes for the next 10 years.'
'The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.'
'The WCS system shall be run in a Windows environment. The WCS shall be accessed by users through the Internet on an IBM computer running a Windows 2000 or above operating system.'
'The product shall able to handle a large number of games simultaneously.'

'The system will notify affected parties when changes occur affecting cohorts including but not limited to changes to the sequence for a cohort’s program of study and changes to a given week’s schedule (lab cancelled this week due to instructor illness).'
'The system shall resolve the zipcode for the street address city and state if zipcode is unknown.'
'The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.'
'System shall let customers cancel their account process shall take no longer than 2 minutes. Database will mark the account as inactive and user will not be able to log into the website.'
'The product shall comply with City of Chicago Application Development Guide Framework.Application Development Framework will provide structured Graphical User Interface.'
'The system shall link Events back to either the Sync Matrix 1.0 or the Exercise Managment Tool 1.0 applications for modifications.'
'The product will be able to delete conference rooms.'
'A new user must be able to be added to the system within 10 minutes. 90% of new users are able to log into the system within 10 minutes.'

'The product shall be capable of handling up to 1 000 concurrent requests. This number will increase to 2 000 by Release 2. The concurrency capacity must be able to handle peak scheduling times such as early morning and late afternoon hours.'
'The user shall select to save the preferred repair facility ratings.'
'The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. : 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.'
'The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.'
'If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor'
'The system shall operate within the Windows XP Professional operating system.'
'The system shall only be accessed by authorized Corporate Community Grants (CCR) employees. Users must be authenticated using their IBM intranet user name and password.'
'The website shall continue to operate if the streaming server goes down.'
'When the hit results in sinking a ship the product shall mark the ship as sunk on the defensive grid of the defensive player.'
'The product shall prevent its data from incorrect data being introduced.'
'The system will use the stored e-mail addresses as a primary means of communicating information to affected parties.'
'The product shall allow a player to end a game at any time during the game.'
'The system shall filter data by: Venues and Key Events.'
'The system shall be able to call the seller or buyer to schedule an appointment'
'The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.'
'Rreports must be easy to generate. eports must be generated within one button click and exported within one button click (after selecting the report)'
'The System shall allow on demand generation of all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since certain point of time.'
'A clinical class shall specify the course name lecture room requirements clinical site needs lecture instructor needs and clinical lab instructor needs.'
'The interface shall be easy to use. 90% of users should be able to successfully use the system to generate a report on their first use. The interface should adhere to IBM usability standards.'
'Once a game has been initiated the product shall make the players assigned to the game unavailable for selection from the list of players.'
'The system shall display clear property images in the search results'
'When both players have positioned their 5 ships on their defensive grids the product shall define the status of each player for the first turn.'

'The Disputes System must provide a confirmation to the user upon the creation of a chargeback request. The confirmation must contain the following information; the dispute case number the type of chargeback requested (pending or immediate) and the date that the merchant response is due.'
'The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.'
'Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.'
'The product shall provide Monitoring Services.The product shall be easy for System Administrators and DBAs to use after two weeks of usage.'
'The product’s Look and Feel shall be able to incorporate aspects of the customer’s organization such as logo branding and identity'
'The message board shall contain the 5 most recently posted messages on the league page. The messages will contain up to the first 150 characters of the message.'
'The system shall interface with the student master server.'
'The user interface shall have standard menus buttons for navigation'
'The system shall help the user avoid making mistakes while scheduling classes and clinicals for the nursing students.'
'Website must interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions.'
'Only valid data shall be entered into the system. No invalid data shall be entered into the system.'
'The product will function alongside server software on any operating system where the Java runtime can be installed.'
'The WCS system shall have the ability to connect other designated WCS databases currently not included in the system.'

'New branches/complexes/districts/regions and revenue/expense accounts added to the BDW must be reflected in the RFS system. 100% of the entities (mentioned above) available as of October month-end will be loaded into the RFS system prior to the budget start process.'
'The leads washing functionality will validate all leads received by the web service for valid data'
'The product shall retain user preferences in the event of a failure.'
'The product shall allow for customization of start page and views preferences.'
'The Disputes System shall provide update access capability for authorized users of the application.'
'The appearance of the product shall appear professional'
'Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.'
The system shall be easy to learn by callers and supervisors. Callers and supervisors shall learn how to use the system within 10 minutes.'
'The product shall be able to handle 10 000 concurrent users within 2 years of the initial launch.'
'The Disputes application shall comply with the corporate standards for user interface creation for internally and externally used applications.'
'The system shall be easy to use by the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.'

'The Disputes application shall interface with the Cardmember Information Database. The Cardmember Information Database provides detailed information with regard to a cardmember. All cardmember detail information must be obtained from the Cardmember Information Database.'
'The interface must summarize the data in a fashion that’s appealing to CCR management. Every report type must have at least one high level summary shown in the results dashboard/interface'

'The users should be able to easily use the system to successfully complete their budgets within the stipulated time for completion. With a week of training prior to product implementation 98% of the users shall complete their budgets within the stipulated time.'
'The CMA report shall be returned no later 60 seconds after the user has entered the CMA report criteria.'
'The product shall allow for intuitive searching of available conference rooms.'

'The website should have an African feel but should not alienate non-Africans. The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.'
'All of the users shall be able to use the system after one day of training.'
'The system shall be intuitive to the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.'
'The website shall be attractive to all audiences. The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.'
'A clinical lab section shall include the clinical site name the class instructor day and time of the lab.'
'The system shall achieve 95% up time.'
'The product shall interface with the ChoiceParts system once per day at approximately 1:00 AM.'

'The Dispute System shall provide the users with the ability to follow up on a dispute case via follow-up actions. The list of available follow up actions for a given dispute case must be filtered by the status of the case and the access level of the user.'
'Only authorized users shall have access to students’ personal information.'
'The product shall be able to process all transactions.The product shall process minimum of 1 million transactions per year.'
'The product shall interface CSR and Datastream.The product shall exchange messages between CSR and EAM on a real time basis without any direct interfaces between two systems.'

'The product must be able to interface with any HTML browser. The product shall transmit data between the user and the product without problems. The product shall display HTML properly in 80% of all HTML browsers tested (minimum is to test 8 browsers).'
'When a shot is marked as a hit the product shall simulate the sound of a shot hitting its target.'
'System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes. Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.'
'The system shall notify the realtor when a seller or buyer responds to an appointment request'
